lead_paragraph: Watford clinched promotion to the English Premier League with a win and a Middlesbrough loss on Saturday, earning a spot in the league for the first time since 2007.

headline.print_headline: Watford Back in Top League With Victory
headline.main: Watford Back in Top League With Victory

snippet: Watford clinched promotion to the English Premier League with a win and a Middlesbrough loss on Saturday, earning a spot in the league for the first time since 2007.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Watford defeats Brighton, 2-0, to earn spot in English Premier League; other soccer matches noted.
